``flush``
=========

The ``flush`` tag tells Twig to flush the output buffer:

.. code-block:: twig

    {% flush %}

.. note::

    Internally, Twig uses the PHP `flush`_ function.

.. _`flush`: https://secure.php.net/flush
=======
``flush``
=========

The ``flush`` tag tells Twig to flush the output buffer:

.. code-block:: twig

    {% flush %}

.. note::

    Internally, Twig uses the PHP `flush`_ function.

.. _`flush`: https://secure.php.net/flush
